text: Wonderbug was a live-action superhero themed show created by Joe Ruby and Ken Spears. The show premiered on ABC on September 11, 1976 as part of the Krofft Supershow programming block until September 2, 1978. It was one of the first shows (along with Dr. Shrinker, Electra Woman & Dyna Girl & The Lost Saucer) to appear on the block and the only one that stayed on the block. Category:1976 establishments in the United States Category:1978 disestablishments in the United States
title: Wonderbug
